zone.line: The Power of Nature struggles round mee along to unveil
Am I a god? With To me will thus clear?
I percieve in these clear lineaments
The working nature for my soul to lie.
Now first percieve I what the Wiseman speaks
"The world of spirits is not concealed
"Thy mind is to, thy heart is dead!
The earthly breast in morning red
As all thus to the whole moves
One to the other works & lives!
As Heavens power from & below ascends,
And thus the golden buckets reach,
From Heaven thro the Earth brigng
Harmony all the all thro' to resound.
What a Spectacle! but ah! a spectacle only!
